name: Egypt Quest Pro - Jewel Quest in Egypt - Great match three game
name_original: Egypt Quest Pro - Jewel Quest in Egypt - Great match three game
description:
A new match-three puzzle game!!!!
TOP INTERESTING/PUZZLE/CHALLENGE game that you have never seen.

WHAT you have in this paid version:
- ALL 120 levels FREE
- NO ADS！
- More Bonus
- Retry free(no 500 coins cost) for continue. Play at your will!

Swap jewel to match three and break all stones to defeat level.

- ALL LEVELS FREE to play.
- MATCH JEWELS in 60+ puzzles - each on is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
- THINK QUICK and move fast for you only have 5 minutes each level.
- UNLOCK CHAINED jewel first because they will block your way.
- DISCOVER secret when finish a chapter.
- EASY TO LEARN - hard to master! Can you complete each level within time limited?
- BEAUTIFUL backgrounds and music as you solve puzzles.
- TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated jewels and effects.
- FREE updates with new puzzles, boosts, and more!

"Egypt Quest Pro" is the BEST-looking jewel matching game for you iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.

We're sure that you're going to love "Egypt Quest Pro"! Please be sure to rate the game below. Your feedback will help us make the games you love even better.

Please note that there are in-app items that you can purchase with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Setting Menu->General->Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".
